summary: Robert Merton Solow  is an American economist.
full_text:
Wassily Wassilyevich Leontief , was an American economist notable for his research on how changes in one economic sector may have an effect on other sectors. Leontief won the Nobel Committee's Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences in 1973, and three of his doctoral students have also been awarded the prize .
^ 
^ http://www.fas.harvard.edu/~iohp/farmanfarmaian.html
title: Wassily Leontief
